meanings.sent1: The puppy was the friskiest in the litter, always running and jumping around.
meanings.sent2: The children had a blast playing with the friskiest kitten at the animal shelter.
meanings.sent3: The friskiest squirrel in the park kept stealing nuts from the other animals for fun.
meanings.sent4: Among the flowers, the friskiest butterfly danced in the sunlight, spreading joy.
meanings.sent5: Her friskiest dance moves at the party entertained everyone and brought smiles.

meanings.definition: Showing a lot of energy and excitement
meanings.sent1: The friskiest squirrel in the park was always darting around, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The friskiest horse at the ranch loved to gallop freely in the open fields.
meanings.sent3: The friskiest child in the class couldn't sit still, bouncing with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The friskiest wind of the season blew through the trees, rustling the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The friskiest music at the concert got everyone up and dancing with joy.
